alert.note: Alert for South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:56PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Pima and south central Pinal Counties through 330 PM MST... At 253 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster strong thunderstorms over Avra Valley, or 10 miles west of Marana, moving northeast at 10 mph. Locally heavy rainfall can impact Interstate 10 between Marana and Eloy. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locally heavy rainfall can impact Interstate 10. Locations impacted include... Marana, Avra Valley, Picture Rocks and Red Rock. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 222 and 237. Route 79 near mile marker 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
